title: InRENEI2026: Call for posters
content: InRENEI2026: Call for posters anni.sairio@tsv.fi 28.1.2026 16:33:10 The Inari Symposium on Research Ethics in Nature, Environment and Indigenous Research (InRENEI2026, link ) brings together researchers, experts and ethics committee members for a two-day event in Inari, Finland, on 10-11 June 2026. This international symposium on research ethics focuses on ethical principles and ethical review in research on nature, the environment and indigenous peoples. The main organiser of InRENEI2026 is the...
creator: anni.sairio@tsv.fi
sourceTitle: Open Science | Federation of Finnish Learned Societies

title: Miten kansalaistiedettä tehdään? – Tutkijoiden ratkaisuja ja näkökulmia kansalaistieteeseen
content: How Is Citizen Science Done? – Researchers’ Solutions and Perspectives jonni.karlsson… 26.1.2026 15:05:53 Event begins 20.4.2026 12:00:00 Event ends 20.4.2026 14:00:00 Location Zoom What do we really mean when we talk about citizen science? A two‑hour webinar on 20 April 2026 12-14 (EET) that introduces key concepts of citizen science and explores how researchers from different fields put these ideas into practice. Webinar seeks to shed light on the practical realities of conducting research tog...

title: Avoimen tieteen ja tutkimuksen talvipäivät 2025
content: The Open Science and Research Winter Conference 2025 jonni.karlsson… 27.8.2025 16:02:58 Event begins 2.12.2025 09:00:00 Event ends 4.12.2025 15:30:00 Location Helsingin yliopisto Tiedekulma Stage Tieteiden talo The Open Science and Research Winter Conference 2025 will take place on 2–4 December 2025 at the University of Helsinki and the House of Sciences and Letters in Helsinki. title: EOSC-symposiumi 2025
content: EOSC symposium 2025 ilmari.jauhiai… 27.8.2025 08:58:58 Event begins 3.11.2025 13:30:00 Event ends 5.11.2025 14:00:00 Location Brussels The EOSC Symposium will take place in Brussels this year from 3rd to 5th November. The event will provide an opportunity to gain up-to-date information on the development of EOSC, which is now in a federation build up stage, and its impact on research infrastructures. Spaces are limited and registration will open to the public on 8th September. More information o...
creator: ulriika.vihervalli@csc.fi

title: EOSC FI node webinar
content: EOSC FI node webinar ulriika.viherv… 26.8.2025 13:32:36 Event begins 7.10.2025 09:00:00 Event ends 7.10.2025 09:45:00 Location Zoom EDIT: Webinar slides are available in a public folder and the recording on YouTube Since March 2025, CSC has been working on a pilot of a national EOSC node for Finland. At the webinar, Jessica Parland von Essen from CSC will show the current status and capabilities of the EOSC FI node, as well as discuss some use cases and its future developments. title: Inari Symposium on Research Ethics in Nature, Environment and Indigenous Research – InRENEI2026
